page.title: 14STORNOWAY NORTH - LIFESTYLE
page.content: A common sight in the residential areas is{Smith's lemonade lorry}making its regular deliveries. We interviewed an employee who told us that on average they make about six thousand bottles a week and usually sell just as much to customers all over eastern Lewis. Using flavouring,sugar and water plus a few other ingredients they make eight different kinds of lemonade; cream soda, red cola, black cola, pineapple, limeade, iron brew, and of course last but not least lemonade. The business was started in April 1978 and still going well with only five all men enployees. Their best time for doing business is at Christmas and New Year and with hardly any changes over the years they're still going strong.
